title: Counties of Bath and Alleghany Middle Mountain Momma
subtitle: Douthat State Park Discovery Center, May 6, 2018
description: 21st annual Counties of Bath and Alleghany Middle Mountain Momma is a marathon mountain bike race at Douthat State Park. Many classes available including the XXC 40 mile.
author: kyle
keywords: race, douthat state park, douthat, lexington, xxc, enduro, bike race, mountain bike race
